effect.Name: Kuwahara Filter (Switch)
effect.description: This shader makes a kuwahara filter distortion effect. Due to the limitations of Pixel Shader 2.0 in Direct3D9, the shader is very different from OpenGL or Direct3D11!
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Kuwahara Filter (Switch) Shader | 1.1 (08.08.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader makes a kuwahara filter distortion effect. Due to the limitations of Pixel Shader 2.0 in Direct3D9, the shader is very different from OpenGL or Direct3D11!

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines which color will be the basis for modification. Set to 0 means it will be the texture of the object and set to 1 it will be the background.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Segment Size
parameter.description: This variable controls the size of each segment used in the Kuwahara filter. A larger value will result in a broader effect, as more surrounding pixels are included in the calculation. Conversely, a smaller value will restrict the blur effect to a tighter area around the pixel.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
